definitions.text: an indication that something has been present
examples: there wasn't a trace of evidence for the claim

definitions.text: a quality of a given color that differs slightly from another color
examples: after several trials he mixed the shade of pink that she wanted

definitions.text: (pharmacology) a medicine consisting of an extract in an alcohol solution
fill, as with a certain quality
examples: The heavy traffic tinctures the air with carbon monoxide

definitions.text: stain or tint with a color
examples: The leaves were tinctured with a bright red
